item.description:
Meet us in front of Fisher College at 8:30 then we will head over and start the walk.

We are putting together a last minute squad to crush this 20 miles and put a small amount of money away for a good cause.  

I think THIS year the road are smooth and the wind is at our backs.  

Bring the sunglasses and the running (walking) shoes!

Please visit & donate to our team page!
http://www.projectbread.org/site/TR/Walk/General?team_id=65759&pg=team&fr_id=1150

Lets do this!!!
item.how_to_find_us: In front of Fisher College, 116 Beacon St.

group.name: Boston Rotaract - A Service/Social Club for 18-30 Yr Olds

item.name: Local Service Event:Project Bread's Walk for Hunger
